thread.title: Area bowling for Oct. 10
thread.title_full: Area bowling for Oct. 10 - Sports - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Area bowling for Oct. 10
text:
Area bowling
Friday BPA Senior Traveling
at Classic
Fran LeClair 268-731, Wayne Wojdyla 268-700, Larry Gworek 258-257.
ABBOTT: Dick Robinson Insurance — Joe Doxbeck 704, Jim Kuebler 258-697, Mike Manley 696, Bill Hoch 687, Joe Matte 279.
AIRPORT: Cheektowaga Firemen — Vinny Puccio 259.
ALDEN: Alden State Bank — Chuck Jagodzinski 259-252-731, Rick Block 269-695, Corey Parker 687, Sean Nowicki 268, Fran Bax 257.
BRAD ANGELO: Midnight Bombers — Kevin Ryan 686, Dennis Illig 677. Nin Angelo Memorial/So-Cal Grill — Darryll Jefferies 256-727, Travis Kinne 257-727, Brandon Kipp 258-718, Ron Kipp 697, Mike Bedford 691.
BROADWAY: Kerm Helmer Memorial Classic Doubles — Chris McMillan 708, Rita Brown 243-686, Connie McMillan 235. Neil Schmidt Memorial — Ryan (Grizzley) Adams 255-677.
CHICKS: Harrity Optical — Rick Kelleher 256-699, Alicia Alguire 233.
KENMORE: Kenmore Renting — Pat Ball 300-781, Tom Foley 268-722, Bob Ehrmann Sr. 256-703, Phil Tabbi 686, Craig Connock 258-676. Tom Foley All-Stars — Kenny Winkelsas 257-750, Dave Aichinger 267-718, Chris Labiak 268-702, Joe Mercurio Jr. 685, Dave Tolkacz 675. BS Classic — Henry Allenback 264-731, Vinny Fermo 298-713, Matt Burt 702, Bob Snyder 679, Krista Voelker-Burt 257-635. Johnny O Classic — Danny Tronolone 258-729, Brian Cline 279-704, Jerry Carroll 290-697, Dave Zajac 260-678, Jimmy Hewett 254. Thursday Doubles — Joe Piershalski 267-702, Charlie Calabrese 257-709, Tony Garofalo 268-691, David McClamb 253, Dom Botti 256. CPC — Jay Packard 717, Mike Bednarek 697. Friday Senior Men — Joe Trimper Jr. 258-701.
LANCASTER: Eagles — Matt Mikula 263-738, Tom Morrone Jr. 300-737, Mike Borodzik 258-729, Russ Priola 268-685, Jason McEwen 681.
MANOR: Not Just Tonawanda Firemen — Doug Petti Jr. 279-257-729, Frank Rizzo 258-679, Aramis Figueroa 254.
SPARETIME: Spartime/Biedron Memorial — Andy Bielanin 278-768, Scott Klein 730.
STRIKERS: Dick Baldwin Memorial — Don Dole 682, Brendan Komenda 675, Andy Wood 258, Joe DePalma 251.
TONAWANDA: Kenmore Schoolmasters — Wayne Moose 267-693, Dave Soucia 257, Warren Bush 255.
WIMBLEDON: Thursday Nite Lites — Carl Rosati 675, Mark Mcmahon 254-675, John Volker 268-676. Black Sheep — Tim Urban 258-699, Alan Christopher 683, James Thompson 702, Louis Scapillato 257-683, Mike Shearer 274. Memorial — Joe Dirienzo 258-252-754, Spencer Lajoy 269-729, Bob Lombard 266-726, Eliot Kolbert 290-713, Chris Lombard 677. South Buffalo Church — Doug Moeller 258, Bob Schott Jr. 254, Ron Bruckman 252, Jeff Biddlecom 267.
300 Games
Pat Ball, his 10th, in a 781 series in Kenmore Renting at Kenmore.
Jerry Carroll, in a 794 series in Schoolmasters B at Transit.
Tom Foley, in an 810 series in JJ Movers at Manor.
Tom Morrone Jr., in a 737 series in Eagles at Lancaster.
Bob Nicoll, in Big Ern League at Tonawanda.
Kyle Zach, in a 739 series in Major B at Classic.
